This is a POC app showcasing how augmented reality can be used to aid vehicular maintenance activities.\n
Three User Experience concepts are demonstrated:
1. Instruction Manual. Able to incorporate more details in the form of a digital manual. Suitable for training purpose where details are important.\n
2. Step-by-step guidance. Step-by-step instructions where the user is able to scan through the steps required. Can pair with voice command for hands-free experience.\n
3. Video demonstration. Watch a video demononstrating how to go about maintaining the particular component. Hands-free experience.\n
\n\nPress the Camera icon on the lower right to start the AR mode and point the camera on the 3 predefined pictures of vehicle.
